attributes.action: restrict MPs' pay increase to 1.9% as for other govt.employees and if he cannot do so, to bring to par the increase of the govt employees to that voted by the MPsfor themselves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Brown cannot DEMAND belt tightening from the population and allow MPs to vote higher than inflation increases for themselves.Also why should MPs be allowed to decide their salaries when none of us can.
